data.text:
I dropped by the cafeteria to find Sakura Bakushin O 
getting fired up in front of a mountain of food.
data.processed:
<story>I dropped by the cafeteria to find Sakura Bakushin O 
<story>getting fired up in front of a mountain of food.

data.text: All of this, in the shortest time…!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: Didn't know you ate that much.

data.processed: <story>All of this, in the shortest time…!!

data.text:
Oh, greetings and salutations, trainer! 
Could it be you've caught wind of my grand challenge!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Oh, greetings and salutations, trainer! 
<story>Could it be you've caught wind of my grand challenge!?

data.text:
You came at the right time then! 
I was just about to start my practice!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>You came at the right time then! 
<story>I was just about to start my practice!

data.text:
Now you're here, you can witness my valiant figure! 
Are you ready!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Now you're here, you can witness my valiant figure! 
<story>Are you ready!?

data.text:
Fear not! Be it races or a Tracen food battle, as esteemed 
class president, I shall take victory! Baku! Shin!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Fear not! Be it races or a Tracen food battle, as esteemed 
<story>class president, I shall take victory! Baku! Shin!

data.text: I can't let any discredit befall my trainer's name!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>I can't let any discredit befall my trainer's name!!

data.text:
I surmised from her words that there is some sort of food battle 
coming up at the academy, and she is preparing for it.
data.processed:
<story>I surmised from her words that there is some sort of food battle 
<story>coming up at the academy, and she is preparing for it.

data.text:
By all means it is up to me, as class president, to set 
a brilliant example for all to follow!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>By all means it is up to me, as class president, to set 
<story>a brilliant example for all to follow!

data.text:
Three menus are provided! 
There's King size omurice, President size fried chicken, 
and Emperor size salad!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Three menus are provided! 
<story>There's King size omurice, President size fried chicken, 
<story>and Emperor size salad!!

data.text:
I'll start off with the chicken! How can I say no to delicious meat!? 
It even has "president' in the name!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I'll start off with the chicken! How can I say no to delicious meat!? 
<story>It even has "president' in the name!

data.text:
Then on to the omurice! 
Meat should be accompanied by rice after all!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Then on to the omurice! 
<story>Meat should be accompanied by rice after all!

data.text:
The salad sounds plain and lacking in excitement, so 
it will wait until after the chicken and omurice!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>The salad sounds plain and lacking in excitement, so 
<story>it will wait until after the chicken and omurice!

data.text: Time to dig in!! Bakushiiiin!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Time to dig in!! Bakushiiiin!

data.text:
The salad seems to have been put off for reasons I don't 
quite understand but… is that the right choice?
data.processed:
<story>The salad seems to have been put off for reasons I don't 
<story>quite understand but… is that the right choice?

data.text: … Phew, I need a short break.
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>… Phew, I need a short break.

data.text:
A mountain there was, and a mountain there remains on her plate. 
I'm fairly certain it's because she went straight for the fried 
foods and carbs.
data.processed:
<story>A mountain there was, and a mountain there remains on her plate. 
<story>I'm fairly certain it's because she went straight for the fried 
<story>foods and carbs.

data.text:
Hnnn… For some reason there's as much as I started with. 
Don't tell me this is some magical self-refilling dish?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Hnnn… For some reason there's as much as I started with. 
<story>Don't tell me this is some magical self-refilling dish?

data.text:
But magic or not, I won't give in! 
Why? Because I'm the class president! And the class president is me!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>But magic or not, I won't give in! 
<story>Why? Because I'm the class president! And the class president is me!

data.text: To be a role model to all students, I must overcome any difficulties!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>To be a role model to all students, I must overcome any difficulties!

data.text:
Sakura Bakushin O was serious. 
…I decided to give her some advice.

choices.text: I know of a way to go faster!
I know of a way to go faster!

data.processed:
<story>Sakura Bakushin O was serious. 
<story>…I decided to give her some advice.

data.text: You what!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>You what!?

data.text:
Do you really, trainer…? 
There's a way to increase my speed…!?
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Do you really, trainer…? 
<story>There's a way to increase my speed…!?

data.text:
I beg of you to share it with me!! 
For the sake of winning the food battle…!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>I beg of you to share it with me!! 
<story>For the sake of winning the food battle…!!

data.text:
Fried foods and carbohydrates tend to pile up in your stomach, 
so it's better to start with vegetables.
data.processed:
<story>Fried foods and carbohydrates tend to pile up in your stomach, 
<story>so it's better to start with vegetables.

data.text:
I advised her it would be easier to rotate between different things, 
eating a little at a time.
data.processed:
<story>I advised her it would be easier to rotate between different things, 
<story>eating a little at a time.

data.text:
Hmhmm… indeed… I understand! 
So I just throw all three in my mouth at once, got it!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Hmhmm… indeed… I understand! 
<story>So I just throw all three in my mouth at once, got it!

data.text:
Leave it to me! 
You can count on Sakura Bakushin O, reliable class president…!!
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>Leave it to me! 
<story>You can count on Sakura Bakushin O, reliable class president…!!

data.text: So she had said, but—
data.processed: <story>So she had said, but—

data.text: Bakushin… bakushiiin…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Bakushin… bakushiiin…

data.text: Ahh, my jaw is so tired… I can't… anymore…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O

choices.text: 'Cause you shoved it all in at once…

data.processed: <story>Ahh, my jaw is so tired… I can't… anymore…

data.text: If only my mouth weren't so small and unassuming…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>If only my mouth weren't so small and unassuming…

data.text:
… Uugh, just talking is hurting my jaw… 
This is it… this is the line…
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed:
<story>… Uugh, just talking is hurting my jaw… 
<story>This is it… this is the line…

data.text: Trainer… I leave the rest… to youugh—
data.name: Sakura Bakushin O
data.processed: <story>Trainer… I leave the rest… to youugh—

data.text:
With Sakura Bakushin O face down on the table, 
I committed to eating the remaining food myself…
data.processed:
<story>With Sakura Bakushin O face down on the table, 
<story>I committed to eating the remaining food myself…
